gobblin.metrics.reporter.util

Class SchemaRegistryVersionWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.metrics.reporter.util.SchemaRegistryVersionWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SchemaVersionWriter

    public class SchemaRegistryVersionWriter
extends Object
implements SchemaVersionWriter
    Implementation of SchemaVersionWriter that uses a KafkaAvroSchemaRegistry to get Schema version identifier and write it to DataOutputStream.
